verses.verse: And Miriam <WH4813> and Aaron <WH175> spoke <WH1696> against Moses <WH4872> because <WH5921> <WH182> of the Ethiopian <WH3571> woman <WH802> whom <WH834> he had married: <WH3947> for <WH3588> he had married <WH3947> an Ethiopian <WH3571> woman. <WH802>

And they said, <WH559> Hath the LORD <WH3068> indeed <WH389> spoken <WH1696> only <WH7535> by Moses? <WH4872> hath he not <WH3808> spoken <WH1696> also <WH1571> by us? And the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH8085> it.
(Now the man <WH376> Moses <WH4872> was very <WH3966> meek, <WH6035> above all <WH4480> <WH3605> the men <WH120> which <WH834> were upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth.) <WH127>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> suddenly <WH6597> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> and unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> and unto <WH413> Miriam, <WH4813> Come out <WH3318> ye three <WH7969> unto <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150> And they three <WH7969> came out. <WH3318>

And the LORD <WH3068> came down <WH3381> in the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud, <WH6051> and stood <WH5975> in the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle, <WH168> and called <WH7121> Aaron <WH175> and Miriam: <WH4813> and they both <WH8147> came forth. <WH3318>

And he said, <WH559> Hear <WH8085> now <WH4994> my words: <WH1697> If <WH518> there be <WH1961> a prophet <WH5030> among you, I the LORD <WH3068> will make myself known <WH3045> unto <WH413> him in a vision, <WH4759> and will speak <WH1696> unto him in a dream. <WH2472>
My servant <WH5650> Moses <WH4872> is not <WH3808> so, <WH3651> who <WH1931> is faithful <WH539> in all <WH3605> mine house. <WH1004>

With him will I speak <WH1696> mouth <WH6310> to <WH413> mouth, <WH6310> even apparently, <WH4758> and not <WH3808> in dark speeches; <WH2420> and the similitude <WH8544> of the LORD <WH3068> shall he behold: <WH5027> wherefore <WH4069> then were ye not afraid <WH3372> <WH3808> to speak <WH1696> against my servant <WH5650> Moses? <WH4872>
And the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> against them; and he departed. <WH1980>

And the cloud <WH6051> departed <WH5493> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the tabernacle; <WH168> and, behold, <WH2009> Miriam <WH4813> became leprous, <WH6879> white as snow: <WH7950> and Aaron <WH175> looked <WH6437> upon <WH413> Miriam, <WH4813> and, behold, <WH2009> she was leprous. <WH6879>

And Aaron <WH175> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Alas, <WH994> my lord, <WH113> I beseech thee, <WH4994> lay <WH7896> not <WH408> the sin <WH2403> upon <WH5921> us, wherein <WH834> we have done foolishly, <WH2973> and wherein <WH834> we have sinned. <WH2398>

Let <WH4994> her not <WH408> be <WH1961> as one dead, <WH4191> of whom <WH834> the flesh <WH1320> is half <WH2677> consumed <WH398> when he cometh out <WH3318> of his mother's <WH517> womb. <WH4480> <WH7358>
And Moses <WH4872> cried <WH6817> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> Heal <WH7495> her now, <WH4994> O God, <WH410> I beseech thee. <WH4994>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> If her father <WH1> had but spit <WH3417> <WH3417> in her face, <WH6440> should she not <WH3808> be ashamed <WH3637> seven <WH7651> days? <WH3117> let her be shut out <WH5462> from <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> and after that <WH310> let her be received in <WH622> again.

And Miriam <WH4813> was shut out <WH5462> from <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117> and the people <WH5971> journeyed <WH5265> not <WH3808> till <WH5704> Miriam <WH4813> was brought in <WH622> again.
And afterward <WH310> the people <WH5971> removed <WH5265> from Hazeroth, <WH4480> <WH2698> and pitched <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran. <WH6290>
